description: Lines when returning from commercial breaks

lines.text: Alright folks, we're back from our sponsors. The lines are still open.
lines.voiceText: Alright folks, we're back from our sponsors. The lines are still open.

lines.text: Welcome back, night owls. Coffee's kicking in again.
lines.voiceText: Welcome back, night owls. Coffee's kicking in again.

lines.text: And we're back! The board's still lighting up - let's keep this momentum going!
lines.voiceText: And we're back! The board's still lighting up - let's keep this momentum going!

lines.text: Back from break. Hopefully with fewer interruptions this time.
lines.voiceText: Back from break. Hopefully with fewer interruptions this time.

lines.text: We're back. Next caller, you're on the air.
lines.voiceText: We're back. Next caller, you're on the air.

lines.text: Ah, the sweet sound of return music. Alright, who's next in line?
lines.voiceText: Ah, the sweet sound of return music. Alright, who's next in line?

lines.text: Commercial break concluded. Resuming broadcast operations.
